page.title: 03HOUSING
page.content: The area is within the Green Belt but {council houses}have been built in{Mill {Bank}and{private houses in Cragg Vale. Many say that they spoil the rural appearance and character of the area. Many{derelict farms}have been bought at inflated prices by outsiders to the detriment of local people.Many of these commute to their work in the industrial areas adjoining.The{Bus {Services}in Cragg Vale & Mill Bank are restricted and because of their lack of use could be cut further.There is increased traffic in both villages because they are near the M62. This is especially so in Cragg Vale where the road has recently been re-surfaced causing increased speed which is particularly dangerous owing to the many bends and narrowness.
